long_description: The Outdoor Research Crocodile(R) gaiters keep snow out of your boots while snowshoeing, cross-country skiing or climbing glaciated mountains. Gore-Tex(R) nylon uppers are waterproof and breathable; durable lower panels of coated Cordura(R) nylon are lined with packcloth. 2-inch wide rip-and-stick closure at the bottom allows adjustable fit for different boots. Tops close with adjustable 0.75-in. wide nylon webbing straps and low-profile cam buckles. Tapered at the ankle to reduce crampon-catching fabric; asymmetric bottom edges provide a sleek, snug fit around boots. Rugged BioThane(R) webbing instep straps with buckles secures the fit; instep straps are replaceable. Use the double-riveted boot lace hooks to keep the Outdoor Research Crocodile gaiters from shifting.
short_description: The Outdoor Research Crocodile(R) gaiters keep snow out of your boots while snowshoeing, cross-country skiing or climbing glaciated mountains.
